text: Rest Your Love on Me is the 42nd studio album by American country music singer Conway Twitty. The album was released in 1980, by MCA Records. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (1980) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:1980 albums Category:Conway Twitty albums Category:MCA Records albums Category:Albums produced by Ron Chancey
title: Rest Your Love on Me (album)
